instructions.en: At the roundabout make a sharp left
instructions.es: En la rotonda siga cerrada a la izquierda
instructions.es-ES: En la rotonda siga cerrada a la izquierda
instructions.fr: Au rond-point, tourner franchement à gauche
instructions.pl: Na rondzie weź ostro w lewo
instructions.pt-BR: Na rotatória, vire fechada à esquerda
instructions.ro: La sensul giratoriu virați brusc stânga
instructions.tr: Göbekli kavşakta keskin sol yöne dön
instructions.vi: Đi bên trái gắt tại bùng binh
